website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, with a extension over 30" and a range of over 30'.
pros: Great for group pictures and capturing memories without having to ask strangers to take your picture
Compatible with several phone models and GoPros as well
Backed by a  strong customer service team
cons: May have to weigh down tripod in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: ... it with us on our trip and it was easy to use and needless to say everyone wished they ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it with us on our trip and it was easy to use and needless to say everyone wished they had one. We didnt have to ask strangers to stop and take photos of us. It was easy to carry, easy to use And it was compatable with both my iphone and husband's galaxy. You will not regret this purchase! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Find another model
customer_reviews.text: This stick doesn’t lock into place, it easily slides down when extended. You have to extend the stick and then turn each section to tighten it. Once in selfie mode, any tilt of your wrist(for a better angle on the phone)will send the whole thing flying back down. The feet work fine but any bump sends it flying over as it is top heavy with phone installed.
customer_reviews.author: LAra

customer_reviews.title: Solo traveler's best friend
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick was awesome. I like the ease of using the USB clicker to take the pics. The tripod works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I don't trust this thing to hold up my projector. It isn't sturdy at all. The stand for the base is so flimsy that it won't support the stand let alone anything that you want the stand to hold up. It is also impossible to get the top portion to stay in place. Once you get your projector aligned like you want, you tighten the knob. When you let go of the projector, the knob won't tighten enough to stay put. It moves, the stand at the base wobbled, and it all comes tumbling down. I am really surprised bc I read good reviews for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality stick, doesn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: While the bundle looks promising at first I found out after unboxing how Bad it is. The selfie stick is poorly made, wobble and one of the level does not open smoothly, making setup very uncomfortable. The 1/4 screw head is very loosely and introduces extra camera shake. The remote control came dirty with small cardboard particles and feels like a cheap toy. For the price I expected more. A selfie stick i got for 5 usd is better made from this one. I tried contacting seller on email but he ignored my email.
customer_reviews.author: BGG

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This was really nice while it lasted. Was amazing actually.. until it broke :( The bottom part where it stands slowly started to getting loose, i didn't worry about​ it too much since it was still getting the job done.. until suddenly it totally came apart with my camera still on it. Thank god it didn't shatter my camera. (I have a really lightweight camera.. the canon gx7 mark ii)
customer_reviews.author: Britney Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Though the tripod is an excellent feature to have for a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: Though the tripod is an excellent feature to have for a selfie stick, this stick’s bolt to tighten the position of the phobe holder is faulty and broke on the first use. Pretty disappointed. The lock in position of each level is quite flimsy too. I will not be recommending this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sirisha Y

customer_reviews.title: My friends can't believe a blind man can take a selfie!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is a lot of fun even for a blind guy like me. my friends are impressed that I can manage my own picture taking without any help and that give me more independence and that is what I was looking for in this product. I was a novice photographer in my field before I lost my vision, but I still remember where to place the camera at which angle, and can feel where the sunlight is coming from, and knowing how to use the programs like "voice over" on the IPhone, and the screen reader program called JAWS on my laptop, well, the is history!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough to stay still while recording 30 min videos, via cellphone.
customer_reviews.text: I just use the extendable tripod on this. (Not the bluetooth-clicker-thing.) I actually ordered a second one because it is so functional and I needed something small to hold a light while I record with my phone. Very easy to use. As stable as can be expected with small tripod legs, but certainly sufficient for still recording.
customer_reviews.author: nstevie

customer_reviews.title: Link up problem
customer_reviews.text: Just got this selfe stick. Tried to link to android phone for remote button, by the instructions no luck but should have as advertised. Will Try to down load APP suggested and then uplate this review.. I like the stand over all and agree, easy to use and seems well made. Will come in handy when by myself fishing. Just wish the carry bag, which is nice and convenient were 2 inches longer. You have to dissmble the phone attachments to store in bag. Having an extra shopping bag along to put sand or rocks in also helps to hold stand feet in windy situations. Over all pleased but not fully happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And worse thing is that you have to hold the stick ...
customer_reviews.text: The legs are too short so that makes it very unstable specially on a carpet floor. The remote range is short so you have to point it directly to the camera. And worse thing is that you have to hold the stick in one hand and the remote in the hand to take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Tripod Stand and Shutter Remote
customer_reviews.text: I chose this Selfie Stick because it allowed us to take photos with the remote. It really worked well and we were able to take photos of the entire family
customer_reviews.author: VaMadhatter

customer_reviews.title: Product is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Samsung 7, it would not pair or work even after installing the Camera 360 app. Now I bought a Samsung 9 and I am having the same problem. So basically, I wasted my money for a product that would never pair or work. I also tried on my wife's IPhone (5c) back when I bought it and it didn't work either. Maybe it would work with a 1998 flip phone. Update: UBeesize read my review and contacted me. They gave me a full refund and offered me a new stick, not knowing why it wouldn't pair. I am at least thankful for their great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product and I loved it when I first got it. However, this changed after the first few uses. The extender doesnt always lock into place so my phone kept sliding down. Also, after awhile the tripod connector began to collapse after the rods came loose. I assume you can fix it with a hex but it's annoying nonetheless. USB remote stops working if you get to far away drom your phone. Would not purchas again.
customer_reviews.author: Kanisha Chinn

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY. Please buy elsewhere!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so dissatisfied, I wanted something simple and easy but the quality of this product is just trash. I opened the package today and ALREADY one of the legs of the tripod stand was broken! It doesn’t even stay up, and I can’t even use it for its intended purpose. Returning. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: jar0706

customer_reviews.title: Pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: The price and how quickly it came . Picture pretty much says it all! If the phone was actually in it there’s no way it would stand on its own. Also it would probably be collapsing on itself. The tripod feature is really messed up. Of course, I didn’t use it much because it was frustrating. I missed my send back by three days
customer_reviews.author: Atty

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this over this past summer for a trip to Alaska. The shaft was long when extended and short enough when retracted. The tripod was very useful. The Bluetooth controller worked as expected. The only complaint was that there was a piece of rubber that was part of the clamp that fell off and I lost it; but I sent an email to the company, and they sent me a replacement part free of charge. Super customer service, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: So far using this tripod has been super easy. I can take a picture using the remote control which was super easy to install via Bluetooth on my Note 9. It's sturdy enough for what I need it. It works great for my needs. So far this has worked for me so I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Awful wobbly stand.
customer_reviews.text: The stand for the stick is wobbly cheap garbage. Why they didnt design a solid stand for a product meant to be a stand is beyond me. Everything fits fine but I bought this to use it as a stand more than a selfie stick and the one thing I needed it for ended up being trash
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The tripod portion, which is what I bought it for, was flimsy and unable to maintain the phone upright in anything greater than a whisper of a breeze. The head/clamp portion wouldn't tighten down all the way and so my phone frequently flopped down after I set it. The telescoping arm was probably the strongest part of it, and even it was cheaply made and I had a hard time locking it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: worst crappy product ever!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I can't stand this product no more. in order not to have anybody fall for this piece of crap, I felt like i have the civic duty to write a product review. it is extremely hard to retract this damn thing. and finally today, it caught my finger. Remote doesn't even work with android. The stand itself is so wobbly it doesn't even stand on its 3 flimsy legs.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Liaw

customer_reviews.title: Bought for vacation, I think I will use it more than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Selfie sticks are somewhat nerdy, but when you don't want to keep asking people to take your picture with your wife or friends and your arm is only so long and you end up looking to big in a pic because you are so close, this is the answer. The remote is nice and works great with my iPhone 6+. The tripod is a nice touch, used it on a table for a family dinner.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Selfie-Stick & Tripod In One - Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great selfie stick! Nice firm clamping of the phone, very quick lock-in of the length and I LOVE the tripod base (which is one of the main reasons I got this camera). It's everything I need in one for on-the-go recording. I haven't used the detachable video/photo record button because I found out that I can just tell my phone to record or take a picture, but it is a great feature - and one that I specifically searched out). I've tried it out in a number of scenarios now and I couldn't me more satisfied! Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha M.

customer_reviews.title: very good product. thank you. happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. i also like the packaging. i like the tripod it is good and durable on the desk also floor. if you have a plus size phone be careful make sure you adjust the stick shorter otherwise tripod is not gonna handle it. also if it is windy again be careful with the tripod stand.
customer_reviews.author: lldigihead

customer_reviews.title: received in excellent condition and on time
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described, received in excellent condition and on time, love the bottom attachment that makes it a tripod but, I only wish it was taller!!!!! We are somewhat tall 5.9 and my brother is 6.2 as a selfie stand doesn't really work for us, as the angle that the pic is taken is unfavorable but as a hand held selfie is great, comfortable. Maybe next product generation will have an additional attachment to give more height!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a trip with a gal pal where I knew we wouldn’t have someone to take our photo all the time. Sadly we got only a couple photos because we were lucky if it stayed standing up. For some reason it wouldn’t latch to stay extended so it always fell back to the small size. Then we were lucky if the Bluetooth would work. I still need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the right price, and fast and easy ordering and delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one who takes selfies much, but this product may have me start taking more flattering photos, and group photos. The selfie stick, tripod and remote are good quality for the right price. Ordering was easy and delivery was very fast. So far, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The good: stick feels sturdy, remote works fine. Comes with a nice bag. The bad: not good for iPhone 8 Plus with a case. The clamp is spring loaded and not adjustable for tightening. It was very difficult to put my iPhone 8 Plus with a case in the clamp. In fact, I had to take the case off. Doing that all the time is absolutely a hassle. If you don’t take the case off, the phone doesn’t hold on at all Customer Service was excellent. They were very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The stick is super heavy and there is no click or button to ...
customer_reviews.text: The stick is super heavy and there is no click or button to take a picture on the stick, only with the remote. So, if you lose the remote you cannot take a picture. the phone holder at the top of the stick is also wiggly and not very strong. I probably wont be using this but cant return it as I missed the 30 day window, ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Ktalina O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap handsfree stand
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for the price. Very flimsy so be careful I can foresee it breaking fast. Was a little too short for our needs, came about knee height. We need one about 3 feet tall so we will keep looking. But works great to take around and take handsfree photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easy assembly, lightweight, tripod stand and I can use it anywhere. Didn't like the phone holder...I couldn't use it in multiple positions... It allows horizontal shooting only
customer_reviews.author: Steph Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I was super stoked when it arrived. I used it several times my only issue is the tripod legs are so loose that it won’t stand up anymore. Now i can’t use it. Totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: pudn204

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made!! Friendly advice, don't purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product broke within few months of purchase. The stand is poorly made and it's not very sturdy. It cannot withstand a windy day if you use it outside and very hard to stand it up in the grass.. I advise you not to buy this product. All I ended up with left was a selfie stick and no stand 😖 In my photo there's two pieces that are circled in blue,those are the pieces that broke, I put those two pieces where they belong, In The TRASH!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great selfie stick. I needed it to shoot photos of someone welding, but he was behind a curtain to protect bystanders from sparks and going blind. So the selfie stick allowed me to shoot overtop of the curtain and get all the photos and video I need without endangering myself or others or being in the welders way. Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product! This selfish stick is sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This selfish stick is sturdy and solid. It fits tightly in your hand and you have full control on the stick and the phone camera very easily. I have taken lots of amazing pictures using this selfish stick. Well worth the investment in buying this. You won't regret. The remote switch is awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Chan

customer_reviews.title: For more serious photos, not quick snaps
customer_reviews.text: the remote is handy, but over all this selfie stick is very large and heavy. I would not recommend if you want something easy that will fit in a purse. This is however great for those a bit more serious and professional than a quick snap shot. This is great if you have time to set up and take better pics.
customer_reviews.author: MISS V

customer_reviews.title: Good little stick
customer_reviews.text: works great! Only complaint is I the ball head lock can be over tightened and then becomes loose. Otherwise its worked great. The bluetooth remote works for the iphone, but I cant get it to pair with the Insta360 one i purchased it for. Tripod base actually works surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Slvrscoobie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my phone, but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return my product because it didn’t fit my phone. I’m giving three stars because the quality seemed good and seemed to do what it’s supposed to, but i didn’t ever actually use it. I read reviews that it fits the “plus” iphones. I have an Iphone 8 plus and with a typical sized case on it it doesn’t fit. Without a case i’m assuming it fits, but i wasn’t gonna take my case off every time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, but sometimes it is hard to get it to lock into place when extended. Remote will shut off if not used for a while which is good if you forget to shut off but if you are trying to video not so much as you will not be able to shut off camera. You have to man Maneully connect blue tooth every time you use it if you have turned off the remote. After all is said and done I am very satisfied with product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Russianusa

customer_reviews.title: My first selfie-stick is great.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I like that it folds up small but is very sturdy when expanded. The remote clips right on to the stick so it's always handy. The tripod is nice for setting up for a group picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Selfie Stick...
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is sturdy and seem well made. It's also easy to use and put together. The only thing that bothers me about it is the clip for your phone is a bit tight, and it can be a struggle to get your phone in and out of the clip. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! I bought it because my brother and I both graduated back to back. It came in like two days! My brother graduated on a Friday I graduated on a Saturday and this was all my family was talking about. They loved that I can take pictures with the remote and that it’s also a tripod it fit my iPhone 8 Plus perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I liked the selfie stick so much I purchased a second ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the selfie stick so much I purchased a second one for someone else after telling them about the one I purchased for myself. I like being able to capture photos a different angles without having to stop and pose. Great idea for the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The remote on mine only works if you hold it a certain way because the battery is loose and it shuts off and disconnects from Bluetooth. But other than that, I’ve had a lot of fun taking pictures with the tripod! Edit* after my review I was contacted by customer service and was sent a new one and the remote works great on it! The customer service was awesome and I highly recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for Android. Just connect via Bluetooth. We took good pictures of ourselves using the tri-pod. WARNING - Wind can knock over your phone causing damage. It almost fell over on us.
customer_reviews.author: Ever

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept but the design is faulty. The pole kept falling over or sliding down. I’m not willing to take a chance with my iPhone so I returned it. Not sure why this got good reviews, maybe I just got one that was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Appears to not work with iPhone x
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my iPhone X phone and the top piece you screw keeps falling back. It would not stand upright! The screw is also very small for the whole. It would not tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The monopod itself isn't the most sturdy and at times the phone would turn to one ...
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth clicker worked really well. The monopod itself isn't the most sturdy and at times the phone would turn to one side due to the collapsible stick pieces turning. It worked, but could have been sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: The extendable hinge is very loose; it will not hold for more than 1 minute. Very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hui Lin

customer_reviews.title: Received it with a bad remote shutter
customer_reviews.text: Received it with a bad remote shutter. The seller quickly handled that by sending a replacement which works great. My only issue is that I use an Otter Box with my I-phone 6s plus because I go hiking and the phone mount just barely clips on. I wish it was just two millimeters wider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my selfie stick/tripod! I love how you can screw on The stand to make it a tripod.The remote makes it so easy to take amazing effortless pictures! It's also pretty tall! Its well worth the money! I don't regret buying this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this product. It is a sturdy tripod, and makes taking hiking photos easy to include the beauty of the scenery, rather than I tiny piece of the typical "selfie". Remote feels a little flimsey, but I hope it holds up. Was more worried about the tripod being sturdy enough that my phone was not in jeapordy, and it is. Can't complain about the price, the quality of the product and the swiftness of the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Beach

customer_reviews.title: Snaps off... yikes not worth losing my phone
customer_reviews.text: It snaps off way too easily, I’d hate to loose my phone on top of a building or on a tour bus or just plain having to fight with it to stick while taking a pics. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: User1982

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: When I use the selfie stick I wish it would bend more towards me, for group selfies. It’s pretty bad for group selfies. The button, did not work at all. At all. It was connected, but when I tried to take a photo it wouldn’t work! It should also be taller and it’s really flimsy. It fours the job, but poorly. Alhough, it did come with a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dam

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent. Only complaint is that the tripod attachment screw keeps getting lose when putting on and off so i have to keep tightening it otherwise the whole stand becomes uneven and falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: As advertised - zero complaints
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - zero complaints. Easy to use, sturdy, easy to assemble, the remote works well - happy purchaser here.
customer_reviews.author: Vimal Lad

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: Like - The remote worked with my Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ camera after I connected via bluetooth, I like the item. I am still asking for some assistance in setting up the item as I saw it came with a few accessories. I would appreciate any assistance that can be extended to me.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Gardner-Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We had one and gave it to a relative. They changed the design a little from the previous but we purchased a part to make it same as before. Love this selfie stick. Sturdy, easy to carry, light. Remote works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris/Ha Hoover

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up with your phone. Remote works easily. Holds phone great. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was fits all sizes.
customer_reviews.text: The button is blue tooth with your phone acts as the wireless shutter for your camera. Although its easy to lose it. The stick is made out of plastic. Was very hard to fit the phone unless its a little smaller or used without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Allain M.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite purchases in a while
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases in a while. It is so adjustable and perfect for so many different situations. It is actually quite sturdy and much more well made than I anticipated. Super convenient and all of the little attachments make for an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: ldmeggy12

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't trust my phone in the tripod. This thing is super flimsy and falls over easily. Works fine as a selfie stick
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: I love the tiny tripod that came with this selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: I love the tiny tripod that came with this selfie stick. It definitely enhances the device. It's perfect for traveling as the entire package is compact and easily fits in a backpack or carryon. The remote works but not as good as I'd like. Overall I'm very happy with it. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie | a Cajun in Cali

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the telescopic stand, the grip on the phone is solid, it is lightweight and compact. The max width for the phone is just right for my phone ( Galaxy 8 plus). I do wish the opening for the phone could swivel the phone to hold it the long way when on the tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it however excited...
customer_reviews.text: Update...Great setup. Easy to use. Easy to assemble. Kickstand does have a way to stop in the grooves of the base. Exciting for future pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Shynn27

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to connect the bluetooth remote to my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to connect the bluetooth remote to my iPhone. Getting the tripod to stand straight is a bit tricky and takes some messing around with, but eventually it works. I’ve enclosed a picture I took of myself with the remote/stand.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and it is great. The only complaint I have is that we ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it is great. The only complaint I have is that we had to download the app for the clicker.
customer_reviews.author: alondra m.

customer_reviews.title: I like it - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it - especially for the price. The only thing is that while on the stand, I can't always get it to stay at the height that I need - it does not seem to lock. And I'm also still not able to get the remote to work. However, this could be user error.
customer_reviews.author: ,Nikki

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the money tripod is a little quirky and requires a bit of finesse
customer_reviews.text: The stick works good the remote is fun. it fits my iphone 6 with otter box the tripod is a little finicky and likes to lean if not adjusted right. I haven't used it much though
customer_reviews.author: Will Red

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Convenient, Bluetooth Remote Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all photo taking needs, small and quick and easy to set-up. Only thing is not to twist the tightening knob at the top too hard it you might strip it.
customer_reviews.author: K.I.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the remote feature and the tripod made it fun for a holiday party prop!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome selfie stick/tripod for the price. Works great and very sturdy. I had an issue with my order and it was resolved quickly and efficiently. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this as a tripod once. The stability was pretty good but I didn't realize the holder for the phone only works if the camera is landscape in orientation. It would be nice if it could hold the phone with this orientation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yola T.

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick Etc
customer_reviews.text: Its fun while it last lol. Its not very sturdy and its been laying around in pieces. The seller is kind enough to replace it but after while you get tired of sending things back. The best part is the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Araba

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tripod. For the money it will work. It does extend, but unfortunately it won't always stay locked. For regular tabletop height it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Its awesone
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. I just bought another one as a gift. Did not come with an instruction manual but I found YouTube videos that explained how to use it. They really need to include an instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not really sure if its worth the price they're asking?
customer_reviews.text: It just takes pictures and not videos 4 some if not most Android phones. Kind of a bummer really but it works on the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Masion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter-in-law.She tried it out today and absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall80

customer_reviews.title: great you need to buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and will be buying others for other family members! Also I really appreciate the customer service this company provided it was first class!
customer_reviews.author: Princessrotty

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t just a selfie stick!
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly versatile, easy to setup/tear down, light, strong, and fun! I definitely enjoy using this selfie stick and the remote for photo/video capture is awesome! My only concern is this available to hardware a connection to the audio port of the phone let’s say:if you lose the remote or it stops working or something. Otherwise, I thinks it’s pretty awesome! My family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cocita

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive tool for anyone to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Prime day and it’s a great multi-purpose tripod/selfie stick. Remote paired easily and no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Oberdorf

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best selfie stick u have purchased. I love it. The tripod works great too. Although it's a lot to carry around. So I just put the tripod in my backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th selfie stick in 2 years and it is the best. The other three were junk. This one is sturdy and can hold my IPhone 8plus with ease. The remote is an added plus and works well. Hopefully this will be my last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mastellarini

customer_reviews.title: Resourceful Set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Works even with a heavy phone like the iPhone 8+. The remote connects easily via Bluetooth. All the tools have come in handy so well.
customer_reviews.author: V. HarrisTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: After the first picture, the tripod legs broke to ...
customer_reviews.text: After the first picture, the tripod legs broke to the point where they layed out flat and no longer were flexible to stand. Would want to get a new tripod set but without the hassle of paying for the whole thing. I’ll give it a 3 because of the selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bedolla

customer_reviews.title: For the most part it does what it's supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it does what it's supposed to do. Took one start off because when the tripod legs are attached, it sits a little crooked.
customer_reviews.author: BPortman

customer_reviews.title: I cannot use it. I need a replacement or refund
customer_reviews.text: The extendable phone holder does not extend at all so I cannot use it at all. It's the whole reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: HSP

customer_reviews.text: EASY TO USE. ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT . HAD TO BUY ANOTHER ONE , BECAUSE MY KIDS LOST IT DURING THE LAST ROAD TRIP

customer_reviews.title: selfie stick material
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would say as far as making the selfie stick better would be to add a personal clicker onto the selfie stick if there is one I may be over looking , also with it being set as a tripod , I feel like it should be made out of metal for the selfie stick part to stay up . Other than that I enjoy the product
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Took this on vacation and it was amazing. The remote function allowed everyone to be in ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation and it was amazing. The remote function allowed everyone to be in the picture at the same time. We were also able to set up a photo booth and used this to capture different shots. GREAT VALUE! I ordered three. One for me and two as gifts. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the stand. The button works like I needed it to. I bought it for myself and ended up using it for work to make marketing videos. It is very short, I was hoping for a normal standing height. Pretty cheaply made, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't change anything it suites all my needs that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't change anything it suites all my needs that i want to do with my camera. Don't change nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m so happy I got it. Will get another for my mother.

customer_reviews.title: Best traveling tool we took for our honeymmon
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I took it to our honeymoon. We traveled to the Maldives, Chiang Mai and Bankgok with it. So easy to use and so convenient... we were able to take epic pictures without asking someone to take it for us! Highly recommend for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Works excellently. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick works great doing everything it's supposed to do. The wifi connectivity is spot on and seems to work effortlessly. Great product at a great price.

customer_reviews.text: The product broke within the second time of me using it...

customer_reviews.title: Im glad i ordered this as it is now unavailable for ...
customer_reviews.text: Im glad i ordered this as it is now unavailable for purchase. The detachable tripod is a great idea. The stick is long and the remote works really well. Its buletooth connects to iphone quickly. I still have to try to use it with gopro.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t not buy !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these within one week of each other. Both broke !!! One in a day . Do not waste your money !!! I’m totally disgusted with it considering previous reviews which I bought because of them. This product actully cost me money considering I use for my business . Spending a $1 is to much maybe 99 cents at local 99 cent store would make more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Nikii love

product_meta.title: Selfie Stick, UBeesize Extendable Monopod with Tripod Stand and Wireless Shutter Remote, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, Other Android Phones, Digital Cameras and GoPro
feature_bullets: More Than A Selfie Stick: Comes with tripod stand and wireless remote control, switch the selfie stick to a tripod easily for steady shots. 360 degree rotating head for various angles, perfect for outdoor activities.

Highly Adjustable: Extendable height from 9 inches to 31.9 inches, small enough to fit in your pocket and long enough to get a large group photo, simply twist clockwise to lock at any length you desire.
Great Durability: The fine aluminum tube stick and sturdy tripod stand ensure long-term durability, while soft foam coating and a wrist strap provide better grip on the handle.
Control the Camera Anywhere: A detachable remote shutter allows you to take picture/video freely from distance (up to 30 feet/10m). Easily paired with iPhone and Android Phones.

Widely Compatible: Works well with most cameras - standard 1/4" thread interface suitable for all phones up to 3.54 inches wide. Ideal for iPhone, Samsung, other Android phone, digital camera, Gopro sport camera.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars800 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
